Name: Orc Survivors
About the game: The orcs look upon you and see victory. But, they will know only defeat. The intense action of the reverse bullet hell genre meets first person shooter style combat. Choose your weapons and your arena wisely as you will have to battle hordes of relentless orcs. Unlock new weapons and upgrades to become a legendary warrior. Surrounded, outnumbered, yet, you do not yield. Slay your foes, upgrade your arsenal and show no mercy. Decide Your Combat Style Master the art of destructive magic, become a melee master or a deadly combination of both. Unleash Your Ultimate Choose your ult wisely and wipe your enemy from the realm. Auto or Manual Fire Use precision timing or just take it easy and set it to auto fire. The choice is yours. Plentiful Arenas From large palace halls to meat grinder dungeons. You choose where the orcs meet their doom.
